text: Mosang (born Maria Alilia Bagio on April 21, 1972), is a Filipina actress in Philippines. She is best knowing for its role Segunda Mano (2012 film), Ded Na Si Lolo, (2009 film) T2 (2009 film) and Pepito Manaloto.http://www.gmanetwork.com/entertainment/gma/articles/2014-06-12/10691/Mosang- is-Miss-Independent ==Career== She started her career as a supporting actress in Philippines at ABS-CBN like Pangako Sa 'Yo in 2000 with Jericho Rosales and Kristine Hermosa and she is notable in Philippine films of horror films, romantic drama films and comedy films, Mosang knowing for her roles of soap opera's as Yaya, antagonist vendor and other works. She is notable in Saturday comedy TV series in Pepito Manaloto as Yaya, Aling Baby or Baby together with best friends actor and actress Janna Dominguez, Arthur Solinap, Jessa Zaragosa, Lance Serrano as a new guard. And her madam Manilyn Reynes as Elsa Manaloto. Since her appearance in Pepito Manaloto Mosang appeared in many other drama series in GMA Network. ==Personal life== She is a single mom with one son. ==Filmography== ===Television=== {|class="wikitable" style="font- size:100% |Year |Title |Role |Network |- | rowspan="2"| 2019 || Daig Kayo ng Lola Ko || Tita || rowspan="18"| GMA Network |- | Dragon Lady || young Doray Orosco |- | rowspan="3"| 2015 || Because of You || Yaya Malou |- | Healing Hearts || Vegetable vendor |- | The Rich Man's Daughter || |- | 2014-2015 || Once Upon a Kiss || Mimay |- | 2014 || Paraiso Ko'y Ikaw || Aling Viring |- | 2013 || Kakambal ni Eliana || Tetay |- | 2012 || Hindi Ka Na Mag-iisa || Betty |- | rowspan="2"| 2011 || Stairway to Heaven || Violi |- | Futbolilits || Beauty Dimagiba |- | 2010–Present || Pepito Manaloto || Baby |- | 2010 / 2011 || Bantatay || Nurse |- | rowspan="2"| 2010 || The Last Prince || Uruja |- | Endless Love || Christine Santos |- | rowspan="2"| 2009 || Adik Sa'Yo || Yaya Mila |- | Stairway to Heaven || Madam Violet |- | 2008 / 2009 || Luna Mystika || Piryang |- | 2006 || Agua Bendita || Tonyang || rowspan="2"| ABS-CBN |- | 2000 || Pangako Sa 'Yo || Doray |- | 2000 || Maalaala Mo Kaya: Apron || Maid || rowspan="3"| ABS-CBN |} ===Films=== {|class="wikitable" style="font- size:100% |Year |Title |Role |- | 2017 || 18 Gays of Power || Aling Miranda |- | 2014 || Third Eye || Aludia |- | rowspan="2"| 2012 || Pagpag: Siyam na Buhay || Ningning |- | Amorosa || Florida |- | 2011 || Segunda Mano || Manang Letty |- | 2010 || Bulong || Morette |- | rowspan="3"| 2009 || Ang Darling Kong Aswang || Bebang |- | T2 || Manghihilot |- | Ded Na Si Lolo || Kapitana |- | 2005 || D' Anothers || Lotus Feet |- | 2002 || Mr.Suave Hoy!
